contents:
ORDER
AND NOW, this 3rd day of July, 2014, in consideration of the Statement of Costs, costs are taxed in favor of Petitioner/Appellant, The School District of Philadelphia, against Respondent Walter D. Palmer Leadership Learning Partners Charter School limited to the amount of four hundred eighty-five dollars and fifty-two cents ($485.52). Costs calculated as follows:
Bill of Costs filing fee......... $53.50
Supreme Court Brief(s)/Reeord $432.02
Total:.............$485.52
